title: Pennsylvania bailed on a carbon market to appease Republicans
description: Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro withdrew the state from the Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative, impacting carbon emissions management.
content: Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro withdrew the state from the Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative, impacting carbon emissions management.
